fields.summary: EC2 actions that don't support resource-level permissions fail to return error

comments.body: I think it is overly broad to say this applies to all EC2 actions. DescribeAvailabilityZones is a bit unusual as the resources returned are not account owned and not currently filtered according to policy permissions.

[~sjones],

You are correct.  I should have been a bit more specific in the title.  Apologies. I will update the title.
